text: wadhari alladhina ittakhadhu dinahum laʿiban walahwan wagharrathumu l-hayatu l-dun'ya wadhakkir bihi an tub'sala nafsun bima kasabat laysa laha min duni l-lahi waliyyun wala shafiʿun wa-in taʿdil kulla ʿadlin la yu'khadh min'ha ulaika alladhina ub'silu bima kasabu lahum sharabun min hamimin waʿadhabun alimun bima kanu yakfuruna
